description: Access real-time and historical stock market data effortlessly. Integrate stock market insights into your applications using the Alphavantage API with this MCP server. Get started quickly by configuring your API key and running the server to fetch market data.

tools.name: time_series_daily_adjusted
tools.description: Fetch a time series daily adjusted

tools.name: time_series_weekly_adjusted
tools.description: Fetch a time series weekly adjusted

tools.name: time_series_monthly_adjusted
tools.description: Fetch a time series monthly adjusted

tools.name: earnings_call_transcript
tools.description: Fetch the earnings call transcript for a given company in a specific quarter

max_data_points.description: Maximum number of data points to return (default: 100)

tools.name: macdext
tools.description: Fetch moving average convergence divergence next

tools.name: adxr
tools.description: Fetch average directional movement index rating

tools.name: ht_dcperiod
tools.description: Fetch hilbert transform - dominant cycle period

tools.name: ht_dcphase
tools.description: Fetch hilbert transform - dominant cycle phase

alphavantageApiKey.description: The API key for the Alphavantage server.
